snippet.title: Agent Intercept launch trailer - Play it on Apple Arcade!
snippet.description:
Agent Intercept is available now, only on Apple Arcade! http://bit.ly/AgentIntercept

Sorry to disturb you on your vacation Agent, but the covert organization CLAW are back to their old tricks. We need you to put a stop to their operation before it’s too late!

Chase the bad guys and race against time to retrieve top-secret counterintelligence in your slick, souped-up vehicle. Drive, drift, and duel in missions across exotic locales, deploying high-tech gadgets and avoiding hazards to save the day in style.

Agent, with the fate of the world hanging in the balance, do you accept this mission?
– HQ
